name: anchor-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Traps the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
